snippet: Goldman Sachs discloses in a regulatory filing that it sold $250 million worth of investments it had in hedge funds and that it lost money on one trading day in the first quarter.
abstract: Goldman Sachs discloses in a regulatory filing that it sold $250 million worth of investments it had in hedge funds and that it lost money on one trading day in the first quarter.

headline.main: Goldman Moves to Comply With Volcker Rule

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
